des: "Chocolate chips, oatmeal, peanut butter, marshmallows. No baking, just drop onto waxed paper, and place in refrigerator to set."
ins: In the top half of a double boiler, melt chocolate chips, butter, and marshmallows over low heat. Stir until smooth, and remove from heat. Stir in the peanut butter, vanilla, coconut, and oats. Mix thoroughly. Drop by rounded spoonfuls onto waxed paper. Refrigerate for about 30 minutes, or until set.
